scripts.build: electron-packager . Lapix --platform win32 --arch x64 --out dist/ --overwrite && electron-packager . Lapix --platform linux --arch x64 --out dist/ --overwrite
scripts.setup: electron-installer-windows --src dist/Lapix-win32-x64/ --dest dist/installers/ && electron-installer-debian --src dist/Lapix-linux-x64/ --dest dist/installers/ --arch amd64
